title: New: Kites – How We Met
body: This cutesy little acoustic number comes courtesy of San Antonio five piece **Kites**, combining delectable lyricism with an Americana tinged undertone. Featuring a stunning cello section and barely audible percussion, _How We Met_ feels like it should either be closing an album about a tumultuous love affair, or opening a record documenting the moving on from a relationship. With their full length record _**While The Dust Settles**_ currently in the works, it’ll be interesting to see whereabouts _How We Met_ fits in on the tracklisting and how the other tracks work about it. Check out _How We Met_ below and keep up to date with **Kites** via their [facebook](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kites/255892044467?sk=info) page. While the Dust Settles by Kites
